# 迁移到云原生应用架构

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/qianyi-dao-yun-yuansheng-yingyong-jiagou
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/qianyi-dao-yun-yuansheng-yingyong-jiagou
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install qianyi-dao-yun-yuansheng-yingyong-jiagou
qianyi-dao-yun-yuansheng-yingyong-jiagou <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g qianyi-dao-yun-yuansheng-yingyong-jiagou
qianyi-dao-yun-yuansheng-yingyong-jiagou <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
